channel.title: Disturbed 317 [Delta]
channel.description:
Here is a Delta project i have been working on.
This project was to try remake and bring back the old rs times with all old graphics no new models/ armour and weapons ect...
I downloaded Deltascape and re formatted the source with a bin and src folder to make it easier to start off with. Once I reformatted the source I fixed all the bad coding in it reformatted every .java file so it is much cleaner the source doesn't lag only when u reach a loading point in the game.
Home is in fally with shops all around.
In the mage book you will have free teleports to home a low training area, pk tele's and mini game tele's Added a Food command in quest tab gives you 100k cooked monk fish noted
Note: The character passwords in the .txt files are md5 encrypted can easily be decrypted but rip it off another delta source if you need there passwords xD
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2342866/old_formatt.png[/img] = old format
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2342856/formatted.png[/img] = clean new format
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2342851/317_shops.png[/img] = home and shops
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2342853/317.png[/img] = old spirits
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2348653/smithing.png[/img] = smithing
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2348644/farming.png[/img] = farming
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2348650/fishing.png[/img] = fishing
[url=http://uppit.com/5j5f6hmy9cy3/Disturbed_Server.rar]http://uppit.com/5j5f6hmy9cy3/Disturbed_Server.rar[/url] = Server
[url=http://uppit.com/z85xlmte31t3/Disturbed_Client.rar]http://uppit.com/z85xlmte31t3/Disturbed_Client.rar[/url] = Client updated 5/6/12
[b]Disturbed v2 download:[/b] [url=http://uppit.com/esd5f1kp3sy9/Disturbed_Server.rar]http://uppit.com/esd5f1kp3sy9/Disturbed_Server.rar[/url]
Updates in v2 are: 1> re-did cooking 2>codded basic farming as seen in photo 3>re-did fishing made it cleaner and stable 4>re-did smithing interface 5>cleaned up slayer 6>re-did crafting
5/6/12 Update: 1> Client spirits old hitsplats
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/2401738/old_hit_splat.png[/img]
Updates to come: 1>event manager 2>separating skills for stable game play 3>re-doing more skills / completing skills
NOTE: smithing is not finished i will be adding the old rs interface where you will be able to smith armor from the bar instead of smith the bar and get money
thanks dashboard for the source me for remaking the client taking out old models cleaned up java files coding edited spirits to remake 2005 Note this is not randqm's client as his was missing important java files
Enjoy the source post feedback of what you think cheers.
Think its a leech this is where I found the base [url=http://google.com/runescape-development/google/downloads/382726-deltascape.html]http://google.com/runescape-development/google/downloads/382726-deltascape.html[/url]
